casebody.data:
Ryan MITCHELL, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
DORE & ASSOCIATES CONTRACTING, INC., Defendant-Appellant. SC: 158598
COA: 338701 Supreme Court of Michigan. November 28, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of plaintiff-appellee to extend the time for filing his answer to the application for leave to appeal is GRANTED. The answer will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before December 3, 2018.
